SEARCH
Package org.example.model.entities

Class Map

java.lang.Object
org.example.model.entities.Map
public class Map extends Object
The Map class represents the game world. It contains a list of locations, a map of obstacles between locations, and the current location of the pirate. The pirate can move between locations, encounter obstacles, and interact with the entities in a location.
